TopicTitle: Some things that would make the VAB less frustrating for me

Articles.Content:
My thoughts on some things that could make the building process less frustrating.  Much of this is the same in KSP1 (but fixed with mods)

Set snap angles
Show and edit part locations
Autostruts

Swap (similar) parts without removing (methalox to methane tanks)
Don't move the camera when I select a part
Panning around a big craft is just annoying
When highlighting a strut, highlight the entire strut
Can I please place my build on the ground
